name: King of the Castle - 2048
description:
The concept of the game is simple - swipe left, right, up or down to move the characters. When two of the same characters meet, they merge into new one.

After you have created a new character he or she gets a house. Construction takes time. You can wait or speed it up by using gems or watching short videos. When the house is finished you can start your game with a boost. This option will let you begin new games with higher ranked characters already on the board.

You have a singular goal: become a King of the Castle. Once you reach the highest rank in the theme you are currently playing and finish building the respective house next theme will be unlocked for free.

Merge, build, and become a King of the Castle!

Features:
- Simple controls
- Addictive gameplay
- Relaxing soundtrack
- 13 characters to merge
- 3 themes to play through

How to play the game:
- Swipe left, right, down or up to move the tiles
- Build houses and grow your kingdom
- Unlock new kingdoms and conquer the leaderboard


FYI! King of the Castle is free to download and play, but, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 16 years of age to download or play King of the Castle.

A network connection is also required.
